abstract: Yasuyuki Konno (今野 泰幸, Konno Yasuyuki, born 25 January 1983 in Sendai, Japan) is a Japanese football player who plays for Gamba Osaka in Japan's professional J. League.He was part of the Japanese 2004 Olympic football team, which finished fourth in group B, below group winners Paraguay, Italy and Ghana. He also capped for Japan U-20 team at the 2003 FIFA World Youth Championship. On 3 August 2005, he played for the senior national team in the East Asian Cup match against China.
